entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
